title: Sales and Development  Director
skills:
Strategic thinking, vision problem with TZ. macro
Good analytical skills
Ability to manage a multi-purpose project
The ability to organize a project from scratch (3 of the startup)
Ability to train, motivate and lead a team
Good organizational, communication and presentation skills. Attention to detail
Established existing contacts in the field of real estate, auto business (representative offices, dealers), banks, advertising agencies
High level of competence in the field of Internet advertising

industries.name: Auditing, Management Accounting, Financial and Legal Consulting

experience.position: Head of sales + Teacher of faculty «Sales B2B»
experience.description:
Tasks: 
- built a strategy for bringing an IT product (financial brokerage) to the market 
- created regulations/rules/instructions in the project 
- defined the product development strategy, developed plan and tasks 
- conducted research and analysis of competitors' activities, their results with recommendations of the best solutions, search for areas of development and points of business growth 
- organized and conducted CustDev with potential product users
- formed the MVP product image and business model, pricing, and product lifecycle forecast Achievements: 
- expanded the partners’ base in various sales channels: financial marketplaces, real estate classifieds, Federal information portals, etc . 
- launched lead generation cooperation with leading financial marketplaces (top 3) and real estate classifieds (top 5)

Tasks: 
- developed strategy for bringing classifieds to the market 
- developed commercial policy vertical: regulation of profits through the sales channels 
- defined a strategy for the development of classifieds, developed plan and tasks for the product 
- conducted CustDev with a potential target audience 
- formed the MVP product image and business model, pricing, and product lifecycle forecast 
- analyzed competitors (strategy, USP, results) with recommendations of the best solutions Achievements: 
- expended the partners’ base: developers, real estate agencies, advertising agencies, Telecom operators, banks, etc . 
- attracted ~ 30 companies to the project and achieved revenue of ~ 10 million per month/ 150 million rubles per year 
- attracted Megaphone into the project "Yula.Mortgage 
- expended the project through Russia: Moscow, Saint Petersburg, cities with millions of people
